paragraphs.original: 话说宝玉从潇湘馆出来，连忙问秋纹道：“老爷叫我作什么？”秋纹笑道：“没有叫。袭人姐姐叫我请二爷，我怕你不来，才哄你的。”宝玉听了，才把心放下，因说：“你们请我也罢了，何苦来吓我？”说著，回到怡红院内。袭人便问道：“你这好半天到那里去了？”宝玉道：“在林姑娘那边，说起姨妈家宝姐姐的事来，就坐住了。”袭人又问道：“说些什么？”宝玉将打禅语的话述了一遍。袭人道：“你们再没个计较。正经说些家常闲话儿，或讲究些诗句，也是好的，怎么又说到禅语上了？又不是和尚。”宝玉道：“你不知道，我们有我们的禅机，别人是插不下嘴去的。”袭人笑道：“你们参禅参翻了，又叫我们跟著打闷葫芦了。”宝玉道：“头里我也年纪小，他也孩子气，所以我说了不留神的话，他就恼了。如今我也留神，他也没有恼的了。只是他近来不常过来，我又念书，偶然到一处，好像生疏了似的。”袭人道：“原该这么著才是。都长了几岁年纪了，怎么好意思还像小孩子时候的样子？”
paragraphs.english:
Baoyu came out of the潇湘馆, and immediately asked Ouyun, "Father called me for something?" Ouyun laughed and said, "No. The mistress asked me to call you, but I was afraid you wouldn't come, so I fooled you." Baoyu heard this, and his heart was put at ease. He said, "You just asked me to come, why are you scaring me?" He then returned to the怡红院. Ouyun asked, "Where have you been for so long?" Baoyu replied, "I was at Lin's, discussing the matter of Auntie's cousin, Bao'er, and sat there for a while." Ouyun asked, "What did you talk about?" Baoyu recounted his discussion of the "Buddhist Sutras." Ouyun said, "You and your cousin really have no common sense. You should talk about everyday life or poetic matters, but you keep talking about the "Buddhist Sutras". You're not even a monk." Baoyu said, "You don't understand. We have our own 'Buddhist Sutras', and you're not supposed to get involved." Ouyun laughed and said, "We can't understand it, so we just follow along in confusion." Baoyu said, "At first, I was young, and she was also a child, so I said something not to be careful about, and she got angry. Now that I'm older, I'm more careful, and she's not angry anymore."The translation of the given Chinese text to English is as follows:

"Just lately, he doesn't come over very often. I'm busy with my studies, and when I do go there, it feels like we're not close anymore." "A袭人 said, 'You should be like an adult now. It's not right to act like a child anymore.'"

I hope this translation helps you understand the text.

Xisi's colleague, Xishu, added, "It's so cold outside, and you have already asked for a break, but you want to go back to school. paragraphs.original: 宝玉认真念了几天书，巴不得玩这一天，又听见薛姨妈过来，想著宝姐姐自然也来，心里喜欢，便说：“快睡罢，明日早些起来。”于是一夜无话。到了次日，果然一早到老太太那里请了安，又到贾政王大人那里请了安。回明了老太太今儿不叫上学，贾政也没言语，便慢慢退出来。走了几步，便一溜烟跑到贾母房中。见众人都没来，只有凤姐那边的奶妈子，带了巧姐儿，跟著几个小丫头，过来给老太太请了安，说：“我妈妈先叫我来请安，陪著老太太说说话儿。妈妈回来就来。”贾母笑著道：“好孩子！我一早就起来了。等他们总不来，只有你二叔叔来了。”那奶妈子便说：“姑娘，给叔叔请安。”巧姐便请了安。宝玉也问了一声“妞妞好？”巧姐道：“昨夜听见我妈妈说，要请二叔叔去说话。”宝玉道：“说什么？”巧姐道：“我妈妈说，跟著李妈认了几年字，不知道我认得不认得。我说‘都认得。我认给妈妈瞧。’妈妈说我瞎认，不信，说我一天尽子玩，那里认得！我瞧著那些字也不要紧，就是那《女孝经》也是容易念的。妈妈说我哄他，要请二叔叔得空儿的时候给我理理。”

Bao Yuyue read a few days of books seriously, and couldn't wait to have a rest day. He heard that She Xiamei had come, and thought that Lady Xue would come as well, and his heart was filled with joy. He said, "Go to bed quickly, and I'll wake you up tomorrow." There was nothing to report that night. The next morning, Bao Yuyue went to pay his respects to his grandmother and the Jia family. When he returned to his grandmother, he was told that he didn't have to go to school today, and Jia Zheng didn't say anything. He slowly withdrew from the room. After walking a few steps, he ran away like a streak to Jia's room. When he arrived, he found that no one was there except the nurse from Fengzheng's house, who was accompanied by Jiaozi, and a few little maids. The nurse came to pay her respects and said, "I was sent to come and pay respects to your uncle. I will stay with your grandmother and talk to her. My mother will come back soon." Jia's grandmother laughed and said, "Good child! I woke up early this morning. I was waiting for them to come, but no one came. Only Uncle Jia came." The nurse said, "Little girl, please pay respect to your uncle." Jiaozi paid her respects, and Bao Yuyue asked, "How is the little girl doing?" Jiaozi replied, "Last night, I heard my mother say that she wanted to invite Uncle Jia to talk."Bao Yu said, "What are you talking about?" Jia Qiao said, "My mother says that you have been learning to read for a few years with A Li, but I don't know if you remember how to read or not. I said, 'I can read! I'll show my mother!' My mother said I was just guessing and not really reading. She said I spend all my time playing and don't really learn anything. She doesn't believe me when I say I can read. She thinks I'm making it up. But the words I know aren't too hard. The book we read, The Book of Filial Piety for Women, is easy to read. She thinks he just likes to play and doesn't really learn anything. But Bao Yu knows some words in a book called The Book of Filial Piety for Women, and he thinks it's not that hard to read.
paragraphs.chinese: 宝玉认真的读了几天书，巴不得休息一天。又听见薛姨妈来了，心想宝姐姐肯定会来，心里高兴，说：“快睡吧，明天早起。”这一夜无话。第二天一早，宝玉到老太太那里请了安，又到贾政王大人那里请了安。回明了老太太今天不用上学，贾政也没说话，就慢慢的退了出来。走了几步，便一溜烟跑到贾母房中。见众人都没来，只有凤姐那边的奶妈子，带了巧姐儿，跟着几个小丫头，过来给老太太请了安，说：“我妈妈先叫我来请安，陪着老太太说说话儿。妈妈回来就来。”贾母笑着说：“好孩子！我一早就起来了。等他们总不来，只有你二叔叔来了。”那奶妈子便说：“姑娘，给叔叔请安。”巧姐便请了安。宝玉也问了一声“妞妞好？”巧姐道：“昨夜听见我妈妈说，要请二叔叔去说话。宝玉道：“说什么？”巧姐道：“我妈妈说，跟著李妈认了几年字，不知道我认得不认得。我说‘都认得。我认给妈妈瞧。’妈妈说我瞎认，不信，说我一天尽子玩，那里认得！我瞧著那些字也不要紧，就是那《女孝经》也是容易念的。妈妈说我哄他，要请二叔叔得空儿的时候给我理理。”

paragraphs.original: 贾母听了，笑道：“好孩子，你妈妈是不认得字的，所以说你哄他。明儿叫你二叔叔理给他瞧瞧，他就信了。”宝玉道：“你认了多少字了？〕巧姐儿道：“认了三千多字。念了一本《女孝经》，半个月头里又上了《列女传》。”宝玉道：“你念了懂的吗？你要不懂，我倒是讲讲这个你听罢。”贾母道：“做叔叔的也该讲给侄女儿听听。”宝玉道：“那文王后妃不必说了。那姜后脱簪待罪和齐国的无盐安邦定国，是后妃里头的贤能的。”巧姐听了，答应个“是”。宝玉又道：“若说有才的，是曹大家、班婕妤、蔡文姬、谢道韫诸人。”巧姐问道：“那贤德的呢？”宝玉道：“孟光的荆钗布裙，鲍宣妻的提瓮出汲，陶侃母的截发留宾：这些不厌贫的就是贤德了。”巧姐欣然点头。宝玉道：“还有苦的，像那乐昌破镜，苏蕙回文。那孝的，木兰代父从军，曹娥投水寻尸等类，也难尽说。”

There's too much to remember." Quiao responded, "I heard my mother say that our little red is from uncle Baoyu's place, but she took her back. I'm not sure if she'll ever be accepted into the family. My mother wanted to take on the girl called Liu Jia, but I'm not sure if uncle Baoyu likes her."
paragraphs.chinese: 巧姐听到这些，却默默如有所思。宝玉又讲那曹氏的引刀割鼻及那些守节的，巧姐听著更觉肃敬起来。宝玉恐他不自在，又说：“那些艳的，如王嫱、西子、樊素、小蛮、绛仙、文君、红拂，都是女中的－－”尚未说出，贾母见巧姐默然，便说：“够了，不用说了。讲的太多，他那里记得！”巧姐道：“二叔叔才说的，也有念过的，也有没念过的。念过的一讲我更知道好处了。”宝玉道：“那字是自然认得的，不用再理了。”巧姐道：“我还听见我妈妈说：我们家的小红，头里是二叔叔那里的，我妈妈要了来，还没有补上人呢。我妈妈想著要把什么柳家的五儿补上，不知二叔叔要不要。”

paragraphs.original: 宝玉听了更喜欢，笑著道：“你听，你妈妈的话！要补谁就补谁罢咧，又问什么要不要呢？”因又向贾母笑道：“我瞧大妞妞这个小模样儿，又有这个聪明儿，只怕将来比凤姐姐还强呢，又比他认的字。”贾母道：“女孩儿家认得字也好，只是女工针黹倒是要紧的。”巧姐儿道：“我也跟著刘妈妈学著做呢。什么扎花儿咧，拉锁子例，我虽弄不好，却也学著会做几针儿。”贾母道：“偺们这样人家，固然不仗著自己做，但只到底知道些，日后才不受人家的拿捏。”巧姐儿答应著“是”，还要宝玉解说《列女传》，见宝玉呆呆的，也不好再问。
paragraphs.english:

Jia Mother listened and laughed, saying, "What your mother says is really true. Whoever needs to be filled, fill whoever needs it. As for how much, it's up to them." paragraphs.original: 你道宝玉呆的是什么？只因柳五儿要进怡红院，头一次是他病了，不能进来；第二次王夫人撵了晴雯，大凡有些姿色的都不敢挑；后来又在吴贵家看晴雯去，五儿跟著他妈给睛雯送东西去，见了一面，更觉娇娜妩媚：今日亏得凤姐想著叫他补入小红的窝儿，竟是喜出望外了，所以呆呆的呆想。

paragraphs.original: 贾母等著那些人，见这时候还不来，又叫丫头去请。回来李纨同著他妹子、探春、惜春、史湘云、黛玉都来了。大家请了贾母的安，众人厮见，独有薛姨妈未到。贾母又叫请去。果然薛姨妈带著宝琴过来。宝玉请了安，问了好，只不见宝钗邢岫烟二人。黛玉便问起：“宝姐姐为何不来？”薛姨妈假说身上不好。邢岫烟知道薛姨妈在坐，所以不来。宝玉虽见宝钗不来，心中纳闷，因黛玉来了，便把想宝钗的心暂且搁开。

paragraphs.original: 不多时，邢王二夫人也来了。凤姐听见婆婆们先到了，自己不好落后，只得打发平儿先来告假，说是：“正要过来，因身上发热，过一回儿就来。”贾母道：“既是身上不好，不来也罢。偺们这时候很该吃饭了。”丫头们把火盆往后挪了一挪，就在贾母榻前一溜摆下两桌，大家序次坐下。吃了饭，依旧围炉闲谈，不须多赘。
paragraphs.english: A short while later, Mrs. Xing and Mrs. Wang also arrived. When Mrs. Jia heard that her mother-in-law and father-in-law had arrived first, she did not want to fall behind, so she sent Ping'er to come and pay her respects, saying, "I was just about to come, but I'm feeling a little feverish. I'll come later." Grandma Jia said, "If you're not feeling well, you don't have to come. We should be eating now." The maids moved the charcoal stove back and set up two tables in front of Grandma Jia's bed, and everyone sat down in turn. After eating, they continued to sit around the fire and chat idly, without needing to say much more.

paragraphs.original: 且说凤姐因何不来？头里为著倒比邢王二夫人迟了不好意思，后来旺儿家的来回说：“迎姑娘那里打发人来请奶奶安，还说并没有到上头，只到奶奶这里来。”凤姐听了纳闷，不知又是什么事，便叫那人进来，问：“姑娘在家好？”那人道：“有什么好的！奴才并不是姑娘打发来的，实在是司棋的母亲央我来求奶奶的。”凤姐道：“司棋已经出去了，为什么来求我？”
paragraphs.english: In addition, why didn't the Fong sisters come? Initially, it was because she was embarrassed to be late after the arrival of the two Sheng and Wang ladies, and later, Wang Erji's wife informed her that "Ying's lady has sent someone to pay their respects to the grandmother, but it hasn't reached the top, only here." After hearing this, Fong felt puzzled, wondering what the matter was, and then called the person in, asking, "How is the lady at home?" The person replied, "She's not well! The servant was not sent by the lady, but by the mother of the servant named Siqi, who asked me to come and beg the grandmother." Fong said, "Siqi has already left, so why is she seeking my help?"
paragraphs.chinese: 而且凤姐为什么不来？头里因为比邢王两位夫人晚到不好意思，后来旺儿家的告诉说：“迎姑娘那里派人来请奶奶安，也并没有到上头，只到奶奶这里来。”凤姐听了纳闷，不知又是什么事，就叫那人进来，问：“姑娘在家好？”那人说：“有什么好的！奴才并不是姑娘打发来的，实在是司棋的母亲央我来求奶奶的。”凤姐说：“司棋已经出去了，为什么来求我？”

paragraphs.original: 那人道：“司棋自从出去，终日啼哭。忽然那一日，他表兄来了。他母亲见了，恨的什么儿似的，说他害了司棋，一把拉住要打。那小子不敢言语。谁知司棋听见了，急忙出来，老著脸，和他母亲说：‘我是为他出来的，我也恨他没良心。如今他来了，妈要打他，不如勒死了我罢！’他妈骂他：‘不害臊的东西！你心里要怎么样？’司棋说道：‘一个女人嫁一个男人。我一时失脚，上了他的当，我就是他的人了，决不肯再跟著别人的。我只恨他为什么这么胆小？〔一身作事一身当〕，为什么逃了呢？就是他一辈子不来，我也一辈子不嫁人的。妈要给我配人，我原拚著一死。今儿他来了，妈问他怎么样。要是他不改心，我在妈跟前磕了头，只当是我死了，他到那里，我跟到那里，就是讨饭吃也是愿意的。’他妈气的了不得，便哭著骂著，说：‘你是我的女儿，我偏不给他，你敢怎么著？’那知道司棋这东西糊涂，便一头撞在墙上，把脑袋撞破，鲜血流出，竟碰死了！他妈哭著，救不过来，便要叫那小子偿命。他表兄也奇，说道：‘你们不用著急。我在外头原发了财，因想著他才回来的，心也算是真了。你们要不信，只管瞧。’说著，打怀里掏出一匣子金珠首饰来。他妈妈看见了，心软了，说：‘你既有心，为什么总不言语？’他外甥道：‘大凡女人都是水性杨花，我要说有钱，他就是贪图银钱了。如今他这为人，就是难得的。我把首饰给你们，我去买棺盛殓他。’那司棋的母亲接了东西，也不顾女孩儿了，由著外甥去。那里知道他外甥叫人抬了两口棺材来。司棋的母亲看见，诧异说：‘怎么棺材要两口？’他外甥笑道：‘一口装不下，得两口才好。’司棋的母亲见他外甥又不哭，只当是他心疼的傻了。岂知他忙著把司棋收拾了，也不啼哭，眼错不见，把带的小刀子往脖子里一抹，也就抹死了。司棋的母亲懊悔起来，倒哭的了不得。如今坊里知道了，要报官。他急了，央我来求奶奶说个人情，他再过来给奶奶磕头。”
paragraphs.english:
That person said, "Since司棋 went out, she's been crying all day. One day, her cousin came. Her mother was furious and blamed her for causing harm to司棋. She grabbed her and wanted to hit her. The boy was too scared to speak. Suddenly,司棋 heard this and rushed out, determined to defend herself. She pleaded with her mother, "I came out for him, and I hate him for being ungrateful. Now that he's here, if you want to punish him, it would be better to kill me instead!" Her mother scolded her, "You're shameless! What do you want?"司棋 replied, "A woman belongs to one man. I made a mistake and fell for his tricks. Now he's mine to keep. I won't marry anyone else. I only regret that he's so cowardly. He should have faced the consequences. Even if he never comes back, I won't marry anyone else. If you want to give me to someone else, I'm willing to die. Now that he's here, ask him what he wants. If he's not sincere, I'll kneel before you and be treated as if I were dead. I'll follow him wherever he goes, even if we have to beg for food."She was so angry that she cried and cursed, saying, "You are my daughter, and I won't give you anything, what can you do about it!" This made the司棋 very confused and she hit her head on the wall, causing blood to flow and eventually she died. The mother cried and couldn't save her, so she went to her nephew and demanded his life. He was surprised and said, "You don't need to be so anxious. I've been out of town making money, and my heart is genuine. You don't believe me? Just take a look." He then took out a box of gold and jewels from his pocket. The mother saw this and softened, saying, "If you have a genuine heart, why don't you speak up?" He replied, "Most women are fickle, and if I said I had money, she would only want the money. But he's such a good person. I'll buy a coffin and bury him." The mother took the items and didn't care about her daughter anymore, letting her nephew go. But when she saw two coffins brought in, she was shocked and asked, "Why are there two coffins? paragraphs.original: 凤姐听了，诧异道：“那有这样傻丫头，偏偏的就碰见这个傻小子！怪不得那一天翻出那些东西来，他心里没事人似的，敢只是这么个烈性孩子！论起来，我也没这么大工夫管他这些闲事，但只你才说的，叫人听著，怪可怜见儿的。也罢了，你回去告诉他，我和你二爷说，打发旺儿给他撕掳就是了。”凤姐打发那人去了，才过贾母这边来。不提。
paragraphs.english:
Translated to English:

Upon hearing this, Fong Ju was puzzled and said, "There is no such foolish girl; she just happened to meet this foolish boy! That's why she didn't seem upset when she found those things one day; she must be a hot-headed child. In fact, I don't have the time to bother with his personal matters, but you just said that it sounds so pitiful. All right, you go back and tell him to wait. paragraphs.original: 贾政便著人叫贾琏把这两件东西送到老太太那边去，并叫人请了邢、王二夫人、凤姐儿都来瞧著，又把两件东西一一试过。贾琏道：“他还有两件：一件是围屏，一件是乐钟。共总要卖二万银子呢。”凤姐儿接著道：“东西自然是好的，但是那里有这些闲钱？偺们又不比外任督抚要办贡。我已经想了好些年了，像偺们这种人家，必得置些不动摇的根基才好：或是祭地，或是义庄，再置些坟屋。往后子孙遇见不得意的事，还是点儿底子，不到一败涂地。我的意思是这样，不知老太太、老爷、太太们怎么样？若是外头老爷们要买只管买。”贾母与众人都说：“这话说的倒也是。”贾琏道：“还了他罢。原是老爷叫我送给老太太瞧，为的是宫里好进。谁说买来搁在家里？老太太还没开口，你便说了一大堆丧气话。”说著，便把两件东西拿出去了，告诉了贾政，只说：“老太太不要。”便与冯紫英道：“这两件东西好可好，就只没银子。我替你留心，有要买的人，我便送信给你去。”冯紫英只得收拾好了，坐下说些闲话，没有兴头，就要起身。贾政道：“你在这里吃了晚饭去罢。”冯紫英道：“罢了。来了就叨扰老伯吗？”贾政道：“说那里的话！”正说著，人回：“大老爷来了。”贾赦早已进来。彼此相见，叙些寒温。

Jia Zheng then ordered Jia Lin to deliver these two items to his grandmother, and asked for someone to invite Sheng and Wang ladies, as well as Feng Er to come and take a look. paragraphs.original: 冯紫英道：“人世的荣枯，仕途的得失，总属难定。”贾政道：“天下事都是一个样的理哟。比如方才那珠子，那颗大的，就像有福气的人似的，那些小的都托赖著他的灵气护庇著。要是那大的没有了，那些小的也就没有收揽了。就像人家儿当头人有了事，骨肉也都分离了，亲戚也都零落了，就是好朋友也都散了。转瞬荣枯，真似春云秋叶一般。你想做官有什么趣儿呢？像雨村算便宜的了。还有我们差不多的人家儿，就是甄家，从前一样功勋，一样世袭，一样起居，我们也是时常来往。不多几年，他们进京来，差人到我这里请安，还很热闹。一会儿抄了原籍的家财，至今杳无音信。不知他近况若何，心下也著实惦记著。”

It's like what happens when the head of a family has trouble, and the family breaks up, relatives scatter, and even close friends become distant. But just a few years later, they sent someone to my place to pay their respects, and it was all very festive. But then their original hometown was raided, and now we have no idea what's going on with them. I really do worry about them."
